txt.en: 'Come, my friends, we must put aside our enmity and earn our freedom, if we are ever to see the sun again!'
'We will fight alongside the Horse-lords, for even they know far greater honour than these foul Orcs.'

'Aye, well, your timing's good. Those accursed Orcs snuck up on me and all went black! I woke up in here just a short while ago.\n\n'It looks like my stay is to be a short one, though, so let's be about it!'
'My men are ready to leave, [placeholder]. We will make for the bridge across the centre of the mine and free as many of the slaves as we can along the way.'
You unshackle the slave and tell him to make for the exit while your band draws the attention of the Orcs.
You unshackle the slave and tell him to make for the exit while your band draws the attention of the Orcs.
One of your companions has been defeated
You unshackle the slave and tell him to make for the exit while your band draws the attention of the Orcs.
You have made it to the forges
'We made it! Let's be out of this cavern and let our allies know what is going on down here!'
One of your companions has been defeated

'Well, there goes the alarm. The Orcs will be after us now. Let's cut a way through and quick!\n\n'There's a number of slaves near the forges, so we had best head that way and see how many we can free as we go.'
You have made it to the bridge
'The bridge is up at the top of this platform... it's the quickest way out, so that's the way we are going before a hundred more of these brutes come up from the deep caverns.'
One of your companions has been defeated
You have made it to the slopes
'I will see you outside!'
One of your companions has been defeated
'Time to pay these vermin back!'
Having made what preparations you could, you must help the Orcs' slaves reach the exit of the mines as you fight your way past the brutal Orc-overseers.
You have made it to the exit
'Here is our chance at last!'
'I thought I was going to die down here!'
Talk to Ondor
Ondor, Edhere, and Meriun must survive
Free any slaves you come across
Talk to  Ondor
Ondor, Edhere, and Meriun must survive
Talk to Edhere
Talk to Ondor
Talk to Meriun
Talk to Ondor
Ondor, Edhere, and Meriun must survive
Talk to Ondor
Ondor, Edhere, and Meriun must survive
Talk to Ondor
Ondor, Edhere, and Meriun must survive
'Now is the time to buy our escape from this forsaken pit! There is no turning back!'
Speak with Edhere and tell him to lead his men out of the mine.
Speak with Ondor and release him from his cell.
Speak with Meriun and tell him to lead his men out of the mine.
Fight your way towards the forges and free any slaves you come across.
Fight your way up onto the platforms to reach the bridge spanning the cavern.
The shortest way out of the Orc-mines lies across a long trestlebridge that spans the cavern. It is likely to be the most perilous step of your escape.
You must make your way up the slopes, then fight your way past any remaining Orcs to the exit of the caverns.
'Well, if they don't have some trouble waiting for us on this bridge, then I will shave my beard, so gird your loins... it gets rough from here.'
'We made it! Let us be out of this cavern and let our compatriots know what is going on down here!'
'It's about time we move...now let's get out of here!'
'We are almost there. If we can make it to the cavern entrance before anymore Orcs show up, we will be free.'
Instance: Revolt in the Deeps
